data.message: Why do I need another app, Facebook isn't showing me the pages I've already liked.  I refuse to download the stupid messenger app as Facebook doesn't need to have more access to my personal info.

replies.message: Hey Debbie. We understand your concern. Almost all apps need certain permissions to enable them to function. For more information about Messenger app permissions, visit: https://www.facebook.com/help/347452185405260 We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that. We hope you’ll try it and let us know what you think! -Hailey
Lol if you knew anything about apps not almost all apps need permission ha
